/*!

 * All rights reserved. See LICENSE in the project root for license information.
 */ /**
 * Error class for wysiwyg inline edits
 */export class EditError extends Error{/**
     * Edit Errors
     * @param error Original Error
     */constructor(error,name,required){super();this.name=name||PROPERTY_DISABLED;if(error instanceof Error){this.message=error.message;this.error=error;}this.required=required;// As of Typescript 2.1 if we extend the Error object the prototype must be set explicitly
// See: https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript-wiki/blob/master/Breaking-Changes.md#extending-built-ins-like-error-array-and-map-may-no-longer-work
Object.setPrototypeOf(this,EditError.prototype);}}EditError.Name='EditError';export const PROPERTY_DISABLED='_MSDYN365_PROPERTY_DISABLED_';export const PROPERTY_INIT='_MSDYN365_PROPERTY_INIT_';
